CustomField.formula: IF (ISBLANK( Securitization_Date__c ) = False, Yardi_Code_Prefix__c + RIGHT(Property_Code__c,4), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This was the Yardi code associated with this asset prior to securitization. It will be blank for assets that have not been securitized
CustomField.label: Yardi Code - Historical
